title: Mutton Vindaloo
procedure: Marinate lamb in vinegar, turmeric, and red chili powder for 1 hour.
Heat oil in a pan, add onions and sauté till golden brown.
Add ginger garlic paste and chopped garlic, cooking till fragrant.
Add marinated lamb and sauté on high heat.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook till they soften.
Pour in milk and cook till the gravy thickens.
Garnish with coriander and serve with steamed rice.
